Text: Good quality, but the episodes are definitely out of order.
Getting file not supported on PS3 and 360 i garbo for streaming. Files work but streaming to ps seems broke. Thanks anyways

Videos are great quality, but are out of order. The corrected order is:   1-5, 2-7, 3-8, 4-1, 5-2, 6-3, 7-4, 8-6 the rest are in order. So just change the current episode number to the new number for instance 1-5, Episode 1 is actually episode 5.
